feed.title: Axel says hi
feed.subtitle: Hello Wiredcraft! This website was made for the DevOps test.

entry.title: Fortune
entry.content: Q: How many IBM 370’s does it take to execute a job? A: Four, three to hold it down, and one to rip its head off.
entry.summary: Q: How many IBM 370’s does it take to execute a job? A: Four, three to hold it down, and one to rip its head off.

entry.title: Fortune
entry.content: telepression, n.: The deep-seated guilt which stems from knowing that you did not try hard enough to look up the number on your own and instead put the burden on the directory assistant. – “Sniglets”, Rich Hall & Friends
entry.summary: telepression, n.: The deep-seated guilt which stems from knowing that you did not try hard enough to look up the number on your own and instead put the burden on the directory assistant. – “Sniglets”, Rich Hall & Friends

entry.title: Fortune
entry.content:
Gone With The Wind LITE(tm) – by Margaret Mitchell

A woman only likes men she can't have and the South gets trashed.

Gift of the Magi LITE(tm) – by O. Henry

A husband and wife forget to register their gift preferences.

The Old Man and the Sea LITE(tm) – by Ernest Hemingway

An old man goes fishing, but doesn't have much luck.
entry.summary: Gone With The Wind LITE(tm) – by Margaret Mitchell

entry.title: Fortune
entry.content:
Please stand for the National Anthem:

God save our Gracious Queen!
Long live our Noble Queen!
God save the Queen!
Send her victorious,
Happy and glorious,
Long to reign o'er us!
God save the Queen!

Thank you. You may resume your seat.
entry.summary: Please stand for the National Anthem:

entry.title: Fortune
entry.content: Lamonte Cranston once hired a new Chinese manservant. While describing his duties to the new man, Lamonte pointed to a bowl of candy on the coffee table and warned him that he was not to take any. Some days later, the new manservant was cleaning up, with no one at home, and decided to sample some of the candy. Just than, Cranston walked in, spied the manservant at the candy, and said: “Pardon me Choy, is that the Shadow’s nugate you chew?”
entry.summary: Lamonte Cranston once hired a new Chinese manservant. While describing his duties to the new man, Lamonte pointed to a bowl of candy on the coffee table and warned him that he was not to take any. Some days later, the new manservant was cleaning up, with no one at home, and decided to sample some of the candy. Just than, Cranston walked in, spied the manservant at the candy, and said: “Pardon me Choy, is that the Shadow’s nugate you chew?”

entry.title: Fortune
entry.content: “I’d love to go out with you, but it’s my parakeet’s bowling night.”
entry.summary: “I’d love to go out with you, but it’s my parakeet’s bowling night.”

entry.title: Fortune
entry.content: A verbal contract isn’t worth the paper it’s written on. Include me out. -Samuel Goldwyn
entry.summary: A verbal contract isn’t worth the paper it’s written on. Include me out. -Samuel Goldwyn

entry.title: Fortune
entry.content: Any sufficiently advanced bug is indistinguishable from a feature. – Rich Kulawiec
entry.summary: Any sufficiently advanced bug is indistinguishable from a feature. – Rich Kulawiec
